static zap.name: Static Zap
static zap.description: Quick finger jolt; Causes momentary shock; Low damage but fast

lightning bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning bolt.description: Shoots a small bolt of electricity; Standard attack; May briefly stun small targets

speed burst.name: Speed Burst
speed burst.description: Short dash of super speed; Moves quickly to a new position; Can escape danger

charged punch.name: Charged Punch
charged punch.description: Electricity-charged melee attack; Follows up well after Speed Burst; Chain combo for extra damage

electric field.name: Electric Field
electric field.description: Creates protective field of electricity; Minor damage to attackers in melee range; DEX save DC 12: half damage on success, full damage on fail

storm dash.name: Storm Dash
storm dash.description: Charge through enemies as living lightning; Damages all in path; Ends at chosen location within range

thunder clap.name: Thunder Clap
thunder clap.description: Claps hands to create shockwave; Pushes enemies back; DEX save DC 12: knocked back on fail, remain in place on success

static shield.name: Static Shield
static shield.description: Forms protective barrier of static electricity; Absorbs incoming damage; +2 AC for duration

circuit tracer.name: Circuit Tracer
circuit tracer.description: Senses electrical currents; Reveals hidden wiring or tech; Can find paths through electronic systems

battery charge.name: Battery Charge
battery charge.description: Enters meditative state to recharge inner energy; Restores significant MP; Requires concentration and stillness

lightning strike.name: Lightning Strike
lightning strike.description: Summons bolt from above; Powerful but takes time to charge; DEX save DC 13: half damage on success, full damage and stunned for 1 turn on fail

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.description: Floods body with electrical energy; Boosts speed and attack power; +1 to hit and +1d4 lightning damage for duration

thunder bomb.name: Thunder Bomb
thunder bomb.description: Creates explosive ball of electrical energy; Area effect damage; DEX save DC 13: half damage on success, full damage on fail
